name: performance-metrics
description: A helper library to determine various performance metrics on front end applications

scripts.check:loggedIn: if [ "$(npm whoami)" = "msmy" ] ; then echo "Logged In" ; else echo "You are not logged in to NPM as msmy!" ; exit 1 ; fi ;
scripts.release:major: npm run check:release && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run check:release && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run check:release && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Malcolm Smy
